## List all albums/artists

Request:
GET /albums

GET /artists

Response (200 OK):
a list of albums/artists


## Find a specific album/artist

Request:

GET /albums/:id
GET /artists/:id

Response (200 OK):
One specific album/artist with the right ID

## Create a new album

Request
POST /albums

With body parameters:
    title="Songs for the Deaf"
    release_year="2004"
    artist_id="3" 

Response (200 OK):
No content, just creates new resource (new album)
